name: @tufte-markdown/remark-figure-transformer
description: A remark transformer outputting the correct html for Figures as used in the Stylesheets by Edward Tufte

scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f es -i src/index.js -o dist/remark-figure-transformer.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f cjs -i src/index.js -o dist/remark-figure-transformer.cjs.js

author: Jan Florian Dietrich <jfd@daenen4.de> (http://www.daenen4.de/)
